queries.query: SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 10;

queries.description: Sum of freight charges by employee
queries.query: SELECT employee_id, SUM(freight) FROM orders GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY employee_id;

queries.description: City-wise average, maximum, and minimum age of employees in London
queries.query: SELECT city, AVG(EXTRACT(year from AGE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, birth_date))), MAX(EXTRACT(year from AGE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, birth_date))), MIN(EXTRACT(year from AGE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, birth_date))) FROM employees WHERE city = 'London' GROUP BY city;

queries.description: City-wise average age of employees above 60
queries.query: SELECT city, AVG(EXTRACT(year FROM AGE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, birth_date))) AS avg_age FROM employees GROUP BY city HAVING AVG(EXTRACT(year FROM AGE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, birth_date))) > 60;
SELECT first_name, last_name, EXTRACT(year from AGE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, birth_date)) AS age FROM employees ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3;
